mapper.sql: id, equipment_no, country, detail_address, online_time, equipment_status, use_status, last_trans_time, trans_num, trans_amount, verify_status, second_region, third_region, fourth_region, country_id, second_region_id, third_region_id, fourth_region_id, create_time, down_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_equipment
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_equipment (id, equipment_no, country, detail_address, online_time, equipment_status, use_status, last_trans_time, trans_num, trans_amount, verify_status, second_region, third_region, fourth_region, country_id, second_region_id, third_region_id, fourth_region_id, create_time, down_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{equipmentStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{useStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lastTransTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{transNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{transAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{verifyStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{secondRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thirdRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fourthRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{secondRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{thirdRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fourthRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{downTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,
equipment_no,
country,
detail_address,

mapper.update:
update tb_equipment
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
equipment_no = #{record.equipmentNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
country = #{record.country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detail_address = #{record.detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
online_time = #{record.onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
equipment_status = #{record.equipmentStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
use_status = #{record.useStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
last_trans_time = #{record.lastTransTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
trans_num = #{record.transNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
trans_amount = #{record.transAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
verify_status = #{record.verifyStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
second_region = #{record.secondRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
third_region = #{record.thirdRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fourth_region = #{record.fourthRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country_id = #{record.countryId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
second_region_id = #{record.secondRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
third_region_id = #{record.thirdRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fourth_region_id = #{record.fourthRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
down_time = #{record.downTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update tb_equipment set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, equipment_no = #{record.equipmentNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, country = #{record.country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail_address = #{record.detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, online_time = #{record.onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, equipment_status = #{record.equipmentStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, use_status = #{record.useStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, last_trans_time = #{record.lastTransTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, trans_num = #{record.transNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trans_amount = #{record.transAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, verify_status = #{record.verifyStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, second_region = #{record.secondRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, third_region = #{record.thirdRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fourth_region = #{record.fourthRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country_id = #{record.countryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, second_region_id = #{record.secondRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, third_region_id = #{record.thirdRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fourth_region_id = #{record.fourthRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, down_time = #{record.downTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update tb_equipment
equipment_no = #{equipmentNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detail_address = #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
online_time = #{onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
equipment_status = #{equipmentStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
use_status = #{useStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
last_trans_time = #{lastTransTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
trans_num = #{transNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
trans_amount = #{transAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
verify_status = #{verifyStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
second_region = #{secondRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
third_region = #{thirdRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fourth_region = #{fourthRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country_id = #{countryId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
second_region_id = #{secondRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
third_region_id = #{thirdRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fourth_region_id = #{fourthRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
down_time = #{downTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_equipment set equipment_no = #{equipmentNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail_address = #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, online_time = #{onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, equipment_status = #{equipmentStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, use_status = #{useStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, last_trans_time = #{lastTransTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, trans_num = #{transNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trans_amount = #{transAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, verify_status = #{verifyStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, second_region = #{secondRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, third_region = #{thirdRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fourth_region = #{fourthRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country_id = #{countryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, second_region_id = #{secondRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, third_region_id = #{thirdRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fourth_region_id = #{fourthRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, down_time = #{downTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select te.id id,tes.pre_ip preIp , te.country country,te.detail_address detailAddress ,tes.equipment_version equipmentVersion , tes.soft_version softVersion,test.running_status runningStatus from tb_equipment te, tb_equipment_settings tes,tb_equipment_status test where tes.id = te.id and test.id = tes.id

select count(1) "monitorNum",
sum(case when tes.trans_status != '0' and tes.trans_status != '9' then 1 else 0 end) "voucherPaperNum",
sum(case when tes.module_status != '0' and tes.module_status != '9' then 1 else 0 end) "doorNum",
sum(case when tes.banknote_box_status != '0' and tes.banknote_box_status != '9' then 1 else 0 end) "banknoteBoxNum",
sum(case when tes.network_status != '0' and tes.network_status != '9' then 1 else 0 end) "drawMoneyNum",
sum(case when tes.prr_status != '0' and tes.prr_status != '9' then 1 else 0 end) "printNum" ,
sum(case when tes.trans_status = '0' and tes.running_status = '0' and tes.module_status = '0' and tes.banknote_box_status = '0' and tes.network_status = '0' and tes.prr_status = '0' and tes.maintain_status = '0' and tes.connect_status = '0' then 1 else 0 end) "normalEquipment1",
sum(case when tes.maintain_status != '0' then 1 else 0 end) "maintainNum" ,
sum(case when tes.connect_status != '0' and tes.connect_status != '9' then 1 else 0 end) "connectNum",
sum(case when tes.running_status = '0' then 1 else 0 end) "normalEquipment",
sum(case when tes.running_status = '1' then 1 else 0 end) "notActiveNum",
sum(case when tes.running_status = '2' then 1 else 0 end) "idleNum",
sum(case when tes.running_status = '3' then 1 else 0 end) "abnormalNum"
from tb_equipment te ,tb_equipment_status tes where
te.id = tes.id
and te.country = #{_parameter}
update tb_equipment set id = #{generatId} where id = #{id};
